item.title: Think Ahead with ACCA: How I Developed a Business Mindset
item.description:
Although ACCA is traditionally known for accounting, my motivation was different: I wanted a deep understanding of business and a framework to make strategic, forward-looking decisions.

Through completing all foundational modules and three professional-level modules, I gained structured training across areas that directly strengthen my work in FinTech, credit strategy, and data-driven decision-making. Beyond the technical knowledge, the ACCA “Think Ahead” mindset profoundly shaped how I approach challenges — encouraging me to anticipate risks, identify opportunities, and act proactively.
